attributes.action: Stop the rule banning XL BullDogs in the UK
attributes.additional_details: This is not the dogs fault nor is it the breed that is the problem. Create a rule that bans certain people from being able to get these dogs! It is the upbringing of these dogs not the breed itself.
attributes.background: Stop the rule being made that bans the breed of the XL BullDog.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
